description.value:
Level 3 Illusion

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: cone

Components: V, S, M (a white feather)

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and have the Frightened|XPHB condition for the duration. A Frightened|XPHB creature takes the Dash|XPHB action and moves away from you by the safest route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a space where it doesn't have line of sight to you, the creature makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on that creature.
